name: Into the Bog
description:
Into the Bog is adventure 2d platform game inspired by I Wanna Be the Guy! (IWBTG),
Bajs as main character is trying to escape from the bog, but whenever he tries to escape he is always thrown into a deeper place, so how did he escape the bog ???
This game give you challenge to beat this game. Can you beat this game without using special power that make the game easier ???.

Concept:
This game could be really-really frustrating because you will die so often, You cant touch the spike otherwise you'll die, or you can't touch anything basically but the platform itself. Don't worry the game has checkpoint so you don't have to redo all the way back and this game also has save mechanic so you can quit at the middle of the game. You are given special ability to remove spike if you die 50 times. There is also boss level at this game to beat!!!.

How to play:
-Don't touch spike
-You have special power to remove spike when you already dead 50 times.
-Go to the Sword for next level
-Shoot the robe to have checkpoint on that level
-If you already malding, you can quit, the game will save the last level you already on so you can continue later
-Defeat the last boss to win the game
-If the counter level didn't increase, shoot nearby checkpoint to reset counter level
-Use flashlight when you are on Cave Level

Tips & Tricks:
- You can tap key Z and X alternately to speed up fire rate, this is very useful to defeat boss.
- Shoot the Robe to have checkpoint
- You can intentionally die to use special power

- Always press Escape -> exit game after next level to save the game,  it prevent you from losing progress (when raging quit and accidentally press Alt+F4)
